author: parithosh
content:

author: tersec
content:
Nimbus should be fine. We're nominally targeting v1.5.0-alpha.5 in latest `unstable` but as noted, that's basically a no-op except PeerDAS.

Didn't make any other changes when doing that update and per https://github.com/ethereum/consensus-specs/releases/tag/v1.5.0-alpha.5 there were none to make (except PeerDAS)

author: terencechain
content: Update: we have figured out our bug for devnet2. If devnet2 needs to be shut down, please feel free. We are not actively using it any more
